channel.title: CVE Feed for Hangzhou Xiongmai Technology Co., Ltd -- XMeye P2P Cloud Server
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Hangzhou Xiongmai Technology Co., Ltd -- XMeye P2P Cloud Server

item.title: CVE-2018-17917|2024-09-16T17:59:25.518Z -- hangzhou%20xiongmai%20technology%20co.%2C%20ltd -- xmeye%20p2p%20cloud%20server
item.description: All versions of Hangzhou Xiongmai Technology Co., Ltd XMeye P2P Cloud Server may allow an attacker to use MAC addresses to enumerate potential Cloud IDs. Using this ID, the attacker can discover and connect to valid devices using one of the supported apps.

item.title: CVE-2018-17919|2024-09-16T18:03:48.747Z -- hangzhou%20xiongmai%20technology%20co.%2C%20ltd -- xmeye%20p2p%20cloud%20server
item.description: All versions of Hangzhou Xiongmai Technology Co., Ltd XMeye P2P Cloud Server may allow an attacker to use an undocumented user account "default" with its default password to login to XMeye and access/view video streams.
